Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Mortem made her way through the information of the Allience Computer. 
Tal-X interfaced and copied all the data provided for them. Then, hearing 
Zardus' question she turned to him.
       "What I need to know is the location of each ship, base, fortress, or 
command post used by all transformers on this planet. It is essential that I 
make a census of them all for the Predacon High Command on Cybertron. Also, I 
want the bots on my most wanted list. If I can capture them and bring them to 
Predacon justice then my entire mission will be successful."
       Tal finished with the computer and awaited further instructions from 
the Ambassador. His large body rested a minute going over the data he just 
copied.
       She continued to talk with Zardus. "Commander, I want to thank you for 
letting us use your facilities. I think thats all I need from you..." She 
trailed off for a moment thinking if she needed anything else. "Thank you for 
your cooperation."

--part1_c6.13061481.27eb758d_boundary
